content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live in the heart of München. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location and a brand new space?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I really like the apartment. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. What is the lowest price you can offer for this apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best living experience to my tenants. However, I also need to ensure that I am compensated fairly for the investment I've made in this property. What is your budget range for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I can afford to pay 800 Euros per month for this apartment. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mr. Wang. 800 Euros is a significant amount, but considering the location and the quality of the apartment, I'm looking for a rent closer to 1,200 Euros per month. Would you be able to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand your position. However, as a student, I cannot afford to pay 1,200 Euros per month. I am willing to pay 900 Euros per month, which I think is a fair price for this apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 900 Euros is a bit closer to my asking price, I still believe that 1,000 Euros per month would be a more equitable agreement, given the desirability of the location and the standard of living you'll enjoy here. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate your flexibility. However, 1,000 Euros is still too high for me. I am willing to pay 950 Euros per month, which I think is a fair compromise.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 950 Euros is more aligned with the market value, considering the amenities and the location. However, I must insist on 1,000 Euros to cover the costs associated with this prime property. It's a modest increase from your last offer, and I believe it reflects the quality of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I believe that 1,000 Euros per month is a fair price for this apartment. I agree to the price of 1,000 Euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Wang. Your willingness to meet me at 1,000 Euros per month reflects a fair and equitable agreement for both parties. I look forward to having you as a tenant in my apartment. Welcome to München!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I am excited to move into this apartment. Let's continue the process to finalize the lease agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Absolutely, Mr. Wang. I'll be happy to assist you with the lease agreement and any other necessary paperwork. We'll ensure a smooth transition for you to become a resident of this beautiful apartment. Enjoy your stay in München!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. Let's continue the process to finalize the lease agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent, Mr. Wang. I'll instruct my team to prepare the lease agreement and any other necessary documents. Once we have the paperwork ready, we can schedule a time for you to come by and sign them. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mr. Schmidt. Everything is clear now. Let's continue the process to finalize the lease agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful, Mr. Wang. I'll keep you updated on the progress of the lease agreement. In the meantime, if you have any questions or need assistance with anything else, please don't hesitate to contact me. It's been a pleasure doing business with you, and I'm looking forward to having you as a long-term tenant. Enjoy your day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I will be in touch if I have any questions.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mr. Wang. I'm here to help. Have a great day, and I'll see you soon to finalize the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
